data.text: @HedgehogChamp My son was still positive after 11 days. He's fully jabbed. 2nd time he's caught it. He had very sore throat and fatigue. My friends 8yr old was still positive after 9 days. Both of them had really intense headaches.  Get well soon #ToryLies #Gaslighting #MaskUp
@HedgehogChamp Oh, I eventually tested negative on day 12!

@HedgehogChamp It took me 10 days to fully test negative! Symptoms went after 5 days or so though. 

Boosted a week before infection. Wiped out Xmas. 😫
@HedgehogChamp Sorry to hear you are still poorly. People do not have the sense the Govt expected them to have to a) still wear masks and b) isolate if +ve (that is if they bother to test anyway!)
@crazyyetnormal I probably won't test now till the weekend. Able to work from home and my partner will test tomorrow before he goes to grab food from the shops.
@HedgehogChamp Her test line also went really dark two days ago. It seems from a few people near the end of the quarantine, it goes dark then drops off completely. Hopefully it'll go to neg tomorrow!

@HedgehogChamp My friend is day 7 and is hoping for her first negative test today. She even had antiviral treatment due to her underlying health conditions. Her test yesterday  was so close to being neg some might've called it neg (but us being scientists know it's a pos).
@HedgehogChamp Glad you’re starting to feel better
@a_roundtuit Yeah and I first tested positive on Friday 😔 pretty sure the line is darker than the first day now 😂🤷🏼‍♀️
